titleInfo.title: Cattle Call and That Pioneer Mother Of Mine - Lew Chilre performance

mods.abstract: Radio performances of Cattle Call, written by Tex Owens, and That Pioneer Mother Of Mine, written by Tim Spencer, and performed by Lew Childre.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
